ISSUE.TITLE: Hide "Sales summary" report from vendors
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40 It's a continuation of a previously implemented task - https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/issues/5216. The issue is described at https://www.nopcommerce.com/en/boards/topic/92428/vendor-sales-email-report-incorrect We hide all order totals for vendors (e.g. pdf reports, order list page in admin area > summary block, etc). So this report (/Admin/Report/SalesSummary) should NOT be available to vendors as well. Let's implement a new permission for this page (enable it for admins only). By the way, we can use the same permission for the order list page in admin area > summary block (displayed below the order table).

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5939 Added new permission to hide "Sales summary" report from vendors
#5939 Added some permission checks for the Sales summary report
